hooks.prompt: AgentLoop Plugin Active. If agentloop.config.json exists in the current directory, this project uses AgentLoop for autonomous development. Available commands: /onboard-agentloop (setup new project), /loop-start (begin autonomous execution), /loop-once (run single iteration in-session for debugging), /loop-status (check progress), /loop-pause (graceful stop). Task status is tracked in VibeKanban (source of truth). Development plan at docs/development-plan.md.
